questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides a fully managed NoSQL database?
questions.explanation: Azure Cosmos DB is Microsoft's globally distributed, multi-model database service for managing data at planet-scale.

questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of Azure ExpressRoute?

options.text: To create private connections between Azure datacenters and on-premises infrastructure
To connect to the public internet

questions.explanation: Azure ExpressRoute creates private connections between Azure datacenters and infrastructure on your premises or in a colocation environment.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service would you use to create and manage containers?
questions.explanation: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is a managed container orchestration service that makes it easy to deploy and manage containerized applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Monitor?

options.text: To collect, analyze, and act on telemetry data from Azure and on-premises environments

questions.explanation: Azure Monitor provides comprehensive monitoring of Azure and on-premises resources, collecting and analyzing telemetry data to help you understand how your applications are performing.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is a characteristic of the public cloud?
questions.explanation: Pay-as-you-go pricing is a key characteristic of public cloud services, allowing users to pay only for the resources they consume.

questions.questionText: What is Azure Advisor?

options.text: A personalized cloud consultant that provides recommendations for optimizing Azure resources

questions.explanation: Azure Advisor analyzes your resource configuration and usage telemetry to provide personalized recommendations to help you optimize your Azure resources.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service would you use to ensure your application can recover from a regional outage?
questions.explanation: Azure Site Recovery provides disaster recovery as a service (DRaaS) by replicating workloads from a primary site to a secondary location.

questions.questionText: What is the main benefit of using Azure Blueprints?

options.text: To define repeatable sets of Azure resources that adhere to organizational standards

questions.explanation: Azure Blueprints enables cloud architects to define a repeatable set of Azure resources that implements and adheres to organizational standards, patterns, and requirements.

questions.questionText: Which service in Azure provides managed Hadoop clusters?
questions.explanation: Azure HDInsight is a managed, full-spectrum, open-source analytics service for enterprises that makes it easy to process massive amounts of data using popular open-source frameworks.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Logic Apps?

options.text: To automate and orchestrate tasks, business processes, and workflows

questions.explanation: Azure Logic Apps is a cloud service that helps you automate and orchestrate tasks, business processes, and workflows when you need to integrate apps, data, systems, and services.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides a cloud-based enterprise identity and access management solution?
questions.explanation: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is Microsoft's cloud-based identity and access management service that helps employees sign in and access resources.

questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of Azure Front Door?

options.text: To provide global load balancing and site acceleration for web applications

questions.explanation: Azure Front Door is a global, scalable entry-point that uses Microsoft's global edge network to create fast, secure, and widely scalable web applications.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service would you use to create a private registry for container images?
questions.explanation: Azure Container Registry allows you to build, store, and manage container images and artifacts in a private registry for all types of container deployments.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides a platform for running containerized applications with automatic scaling and management?
questions.explanation: Azure Container Instances provides a fast and simple way to run containerized applications in Azure, with automatic scaling and management capabilities.

questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of Azure Sentinel?

options.text: Cloud-native security information and event management (SIEM)

questions.explanation: Azure Sentinel is a cloud-native SIEM that provides intelligent security analytics across your enterprise.

questions.questionText: Which service provides automated machine learning capabilities in Azure?
questions.explanation: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based environment for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Information Protection?

options.text: To classify and protect documents and emails

questions.explanation: Azure Information Protection helps organizations classify and protect documents and emails by applying labels.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides a managed Apache Spark environment?
questions.explanation: Azure Databricks provides a managed Apache Spark environment that can be integrated with other Azure services.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure DevTest Labs?

options.text: To create environments for development and testing

questions.explanation: Azure DevTest Labs helps developers and testers quickly create environments in Azure while minimizing waste and controlling cost.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service would you use to create a hybrid file system?
questions.explanation: Azure StorSimple provides an integrated storage solution that manages storage tasks between on-premises devices and Azure cloud storage.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Time Series Insights?

options.text: To analyze time-series data from IoT devices

questions.explanation: Azure Time Series Insights is designed to store, visualize, and query large amounts of time series data, such as that generated by IoT devices.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed PostgreSQL databases?
questions.explanation: Azure Database for PostgreSQL is a fully managed database service for PostgreSQL that can handle mission-critical workloads with predictable performance and dynamic scalability.

questions.questionText: What is the main benefit of using Azure Reserved VM Instances?

options.text: To save money by pre-paying for one or three years of virtual machine usage

questions.explanation: Azure Reserved VM Instances provide significant cost savings when you commit to one-year or three-year terms for virtual machine usage.

questions.questionText: Which service would you use to create a private Docker container registry in Azure?
questions.explanation: Azure Container Registry allows you to build, store, and manage container images and artifacts in a private registry for all types of container deployments.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Service Fabric?

options.text: To build and operate always-on, scalable, distributed applications

questions.explanation: Azure Service Fabric is a distributed systems platform that makes it easy to package, deploy, and manage scalable and reliable microservices and containers.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed MariaDB databases?
questions.explanation: Azure Database for MariaDB is a fully managed database service for MariaDB that can handle mission-critical workloads with predictable performance and dynamic scalability.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure Application Gateway?

options.text: To provide web application firewall and load balancing capabilities

questions.explanation: Azure Application Gateway is a web traffic load balancer that enables you to manage traffic to your web applications and includes a web application firewall.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service would you use to implement a site-to-site VPN?
questions.explanation: Azure VPN Gateway enables you to create encrypted cross-premises connections between your virtual network and on-premises networks.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Batch?

options.text: To run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications

questions.explanation: Azure Batch enables you to run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications efficiently in the cloud.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides a managed Redis cache?
questions.explanation: Azure Cache for Redis provides an in-memory data store based on Redis that helps improve the performance and scalability of applications.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure API Management?

options.text: To publish, secure, transform, maintain, and monitor APIs

questions.explanation: Azure API Management helps organizations publish APIs to external, partner, and internal developers to unlock the potential of their data and services.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed MySQL databases?
questions.explanation: Azure Database for MySQL is a fully managed database service for MySQL that can handle mission-critical workloads with predictable performance and dynamic scalability.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Service Bus?

options.text: To provide a fully managed enterprise message broker

questions.explanation: Azure Service Bus is a fully managed enterprise integration message broker that enables you to decouple applications and services from each other.

questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of Azure Bastion?

options.text: To provide secure RDP and SSH access to virtual machines

questions.explanation: Azure Bastion provides secure and seamless RDP/SSH connectivity to your virtual machines directly from the Azure portal over SSL.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service is used for creating and sharing dashboards?
questions.explanation: Azure Dashboard allows you to create customized views and share monitoring data across your organization.

questions.questionText: What is the main benefit of Azure Spot Virtual Machines?

options.text: Significant cost savings with interruptible workloads

questions.explanation: Azure Spot VMs allow you to take advantage of unused Azure capacity at a significant cost savings, with the tradeoff that they may be interrupted.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed Elasticsearch?
questions.explanation: Azure Elastic provides fully managed Elasticsearch service that makes it easy to deploy, operate, and scale Elasticsearch clusters.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Private Link?

options.text: To access Azure PaaS services over a private endpoint in your virtual network

questions.explanation: Azure Private Link enables you to access Azure PaaS Services over a private endpoint in your virtual network, eliminating exposure to the public internet.

questions.questionText: Which feature in Azure AD provides secure remote access to on-premises web applications?
questions.explanation: Azure AD Application Proxy provides secure remote access to on-premises web applications, allowing users to access internal applications from outside the corporate network.

questions.questionText: What is the primary use of Azure Data Share?

options.text: To share data securely between organizations

questions.explanation: Azure Data Share enables organizations to securely share data with multiple customers and partners, providing simple and secure data sharing capabilities.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed Apache Cassandra?

options.text: Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra

questions.explanation: Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra provides a managed service for running Apache Cassandra workloads on Azure.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure Lighthouse?

options.text: To enable multi-tenant management at scale

questions.explanation: Azure Lighthouse enables service providers to manage multiple customer tenants from a single control plane, increasing efficiency and scalability.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed event routing?
questions.explanation: Azure Event Grid provides managed event routing that enables event-driven architectures with near real-time event delivery.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Dedicated Host?

options.text: To provide physical servers dedicated to one Azure subscription

questions.explanation: Azure Dedicated Host provides physical servers that host one or more virtual machines and are dedicated to one Azure subscription.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service helps in discovering and managing your organization's data estate?
questions.explanation: Azure Purview is a unified data governance service that helps manage and govern your on-premises, multi-cloud, and SaaS data.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure Sphere?

options.text: To create secured, connected MCU-powered devices

questions.explanation: Azure Sphere is a secured, high-level application platform with built-in communication and security features for internet-connected devices.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed Apache Kafka?

options.text: Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka

questions.explanation: Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka provides a managed service compatible with Apache Kafka that enables you to use Kafka clients and tools with Event Hubs.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Stack?

options.text: To extend Azure services and capabilities to your environment of choice

questions.explanation: Azure Stack extends Azure services and capabilities to your environment of choice - from the datacenter to edge locations and remote offices.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed Jenkins?
questions.explanation: Azure DevOps provides managed Jenkins services as part of its continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) capabilities.

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of Azure Cognitive Search?

options.text: To add search capabilities to applications

questions.explanation: Azure Cognitive Search is a cloud search service that gives developers APIs and tools for adding a rich search experience over private, heterogeneous content in web, mobile, and enterprise applications.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed OpenShift clusters?
questions.explanation: Azure Red Hat OpenShift provides fully managed OpenShift clusters on Azure, jointly engineered and supported by Microsoft and Red Hat.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Azure Percept?

options.text: To develop and deploy AI solutions at the edge

questions.explanation: Azure Percept is a comprehensive, easy-to-use platform with added security for creating and deploying AI solutions to the edge.

questions.questionText: Which Azure service provides managed Apache HBase?
questions.explanation: Azure HDInsight provides managed Apache HBase clusters as part of its big data processing capabilities.
